messages.subject: Re: Learn Nothing Day, two more weeks
messages.msgSnippet: Oh, brilliant! My kids will be stuck in the car all day that day. We might just have a chance. It would be easier if you knew of a supplier of some knock-out
messages.messageBody:
Oh, brilliant! My kids will be stuck in the car all day that day. We might just have a chance. It would be easier if you knew of a supplier of some knock-out drugs that wouldn't even let them dream. Oh, but one of us will have to stay awake. Drat. Would be bad for traffic if we didn't. Well, we'll do our best.

Karen W.

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, Sandra Dodd <Sandra@...> wrote:
>
> Learn while you can. The day is coming when all unschoolers everywhere will stop learning, for a day.
>
> http://www.sandradodd.com/learnnothingday/
>
> When people ask if you ever take a day off, now you can honestly say "Yes, we do."
>
> This will be Learn Nothing Day #5. The first one was in 2008. People still learned, that first year, but we've had a few years to get better at it now. And with two weeks to plan, I hope you'll all find great success.
>
> Sandra
>

messages.subject: Learn Nothing Day, two more weeks
messages.msgSnippet: Learn while you can.  The day is coming when all unschoolers everywhere will stop learning, for a day. http://www.sandradodd.com/learnnothingday/ When people
messages.messageBody:
Learn while you can. The day is coming when all unschoolers everywhere will stop learning, for a day.

http://www.sandradodd.com/learnnothingday/

When people ask if you ever take a day off, now you can honestly say "Yes, we do."

This will be Learn Nothing Day #5. The first one was in 2008. People still learned, that first year, but we've had a few years to get better at it now. And with two weeks to plan, I hope you'll all find great success.

Sandra
